lead_paragraph: The $2.4 billion Revel Casino Hotel that opened just over two years ago as a hoped-for savior for Atlantic City's flagging casino industry will close a week earlier than originally planned, the company announced in an email Friday.

headline.main: Revel Casino to Close 8 Days Earlier Than Planned
headline.print_headline: Revel Casino to Close 8 Days Earlier Than Planned
